attributes.action: Stop The Home Office approving revenue earning Spec3 speed cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to stop the approval and rollout of average speed cameras on the UK road network. for more information on the cameras and the plans please visit the timesonline driving section. We the undersigned beleve that the motorist is already bombarded with taxes fines and more taxes for driving and this is not about safety its about earning revenue from a soft easy target.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
